docs.lead_paragraph: Mrs. W. H. Harkness became last night the first woman to attend an annual dinner of the Explorers Club. She came as official escort of her baby giant panda, Su-Lin, ceremoniously announced as the one and only guest of honor.

headline.main: BABY PANDA CRIES AT DEBUT ON RADIO; Mrs. Harkness Holds It Up to Microphone at Dinner of the Explorers Club. ITS HEALTH IS GUARDED Rare Animal Rests in Air-Cooled Room While Waiting to Start the Broadcast. Taken to Air-Cooled Room A Big Moment on Radio

docs.abstract: Mrs W H Harkness takes baby panda to Explorers Club dinner
docs.snippet: Mrs. W. H. Harkness became last night the first woman to attend an annual dinner of the Explorers Club. She came as official escort of her baby giant panda, Su-Lin, ceremoniously announced as the one and only guest of honor.
